description: a(1) = 1, a(2) = 2. Let i = a(n-2), j = a(n-1). For n > 2 if rad(i*j) is primorial number A002110(t), a(n) is least novel k such that rad(i*j*k) = A002110(t+1). Otherwise, if rad(i*j) is not primorial, a(n) is least novel k such that rad(i*j*k) = A002110(s), where prime(s) = A006530(i*j); rad = A007947.
